completed_steps.summary: Classified as Monolith with 1 part: Web Application
Found existing docs: README.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, and docs/ folder contents. User provided no additional context.
Tech stack: Next.js 15.5.4 + React 19.1.0 + TypeScript 5.9.3, Dexie v4.2.0, Tailwind CSS v4
Completed deep scans: API (6 endpoints), Data Models (Dexie v30 schema), UI Components (Feature-based + Radix UI)
Generated source tree documentation mapping src/app, src/components, and src/lib structure.
Generated architecture.md reflecting Hybrid Local-First model, Unified Body Markers, and Event Sourcing.
Generated development-guide.md with updated links and workflow instructions.
Generated docs/index.md linking all documentation artifacts.
Verified file completeness, content quality, and PRD presence. Finalized report.

findings.existing_docs: README.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, docs/ folder (PRD, stories, api-contracts, etc.)
